All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Asset
Asset class to store relevant market info on held assets.
AssetQuote
The AssetQuote class used to hold pricing information of Assets, this includes.
ConsoleColors
ConsoleColors defines colours for the User Interface.
DateTimeHelper
PortfolioSystem class provides from useful helpers for dealing with epoch conversion between long and human-readable strings.
Finance
Simple POJO class used for deserializing responses from yahoo finance api.
Main
The Main class provides the UI and entry point for the investment portfolio project.
MarketClient
This interface displays the asset quote and symbol, including which stock are trending segmented by region.
MarketClientFactory
MarketClientFactory constructor.
MarketClientFactory.MarketClientTypes
Enumeration containing both types of market client implemented in our code.
MockClient
MockClient is used to Mock MarketClient for unit testing.
PortfolioManager
PortfolioManager adds the functionality outlined in the PortfolioSystem interface The user can add funds, buy and sell stock, get stock information, and list and sort assets.
PortfolioSystem
Interface implemented by PortfolioManager.

Simple POJO class used for deserializing responses from yahoo finance api.

The ScannerInput class is responsible to getting user input via the console.

Class added to hold all sale information from asset objects.
YahooClient
